title: devologic
author: devologic
content: ******GDX TOKEN******Greetings to the entire crypto community.GoldenX has launched its token for private sale from today until February 28, 2023.Name: GoldenX ecosystem tokensymbol: GDXnetwork: BSCsupply: 21,000,000Ico - presale= 700,000 tokenscontract: 0xC8b28eDa9B1968af4322CB3a54806Bbac94BabC8whitepaper: https://token.mygoldenx.pro/whitepaper.pdf ;DGoldenX is a current community of 40,000 users, with projections to reach 270,000 by the end of 2023. They are developing a marketplace, a crypto casino, crypto-lottery, a crypto betting system, metaverse, a payment gateway, and real estate investment projects. tourist companies that will only accept the GDX governance token. As an investment proposal for the crypto community, develop scalable projects that can generate returns and maintain deflation in the token, which is one of the most important crypto community proposals at the beginning of 2023. In his metaverse project, he will develop the interaction of virtual education with entertainment.We call on the community to support this project and any technical suggestion will be welcome.Your website to buy the token in the ICO phase is: token.mygoldenx.pro     Twitter: https://twitter.com/gdxtokentelegram channel: https://t.me/GDX_token_ecosystem

comments.author: BlueMoonLi
comments.body: Me parece un proyecto con mucho potencia tecnológico que puede revolucionar el mercado financiero en corto plazo. Estoy pensando invertir en el proyecto.

comments.author: worldiscrypto
comments.body: I was checking the info of this new project, the token already was created in BNB Smart Chain, I will get some tokens for stacking in this pre sale, looks good, and I will keep an eye on the project and comunity that GDX has.. Thanks and good luck!
